text: Ourém, formerly known as Vila Nova de Ourém, is a city and a municipality in the Santarém District in Portugal. In 2011, 45,932 people lived there.Instituto Nacional de Estatística It has an area of 416.68 km2. The municipality of Ourém has two cities: Ourém (about 12,000 people) and Fátima (about 11,000 people). == References == == Other websites == * Municipality official website Category:Municipalities of Portugal Category:Cities in Portugal Category:Santarém District
title: Ourém
